items.sentence: Tom told me that I should go to Boston with Mary.

Tom told me he thought that Mary would be scared.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was thirty.
I\'m not sure Tom and Mary both want to go there.
I thought Tom and Mary were both going to hit me.
Tom climbed into the driver\'s seat of the truck.
Tom certainly doesn\'t have the power he used to.
Tom couldn\'t see Mary from where he was sitting.
Asking questions is the best way to learn things.
Can you tell me what the capital of Australia is?

I don\'t think that I\'ll need an umbrella today.

Tom almost always does what he promises he'll do.
Tom and I are the ones who should be apologizing.

I don't have a girlfriend and Tom doesn't either.
